True dmg on E with shit load of AS and double attack with passive with W dmg red and heal in a middle of fight.. Also be able to dodge all shits with Q and can't be slowed when press R is broken... 
He oneshot ADC or anyone who is not full tank..
But also kill tanks in like 3 second bcs of true dmg on his E and items like IE, BOTRK, Last Whisper or runes like Conq

Only real counter play to that is point n click stun but you don't rly have time to stun him.. And if you stun him and he press W you deal no dmg to him and he will kill you in less then 3 sec after that...
